info_1: Seize the opportunity to send your gratitude on 11/15~11/22 (before 12 pm). In addition to conveying positive energy, you'll have the chance to draw for a reward of 200 Kudos Points (equivalent to a 200 electronic gift certificate with 100 places)!
info_3: On Thanksgiving Day, there will also be a <1>“Thanksgiving Special >>>  Don't Miss Chickens Pop-up Event”</1>. The people who receives the most gratitude will have the opportunity to become the “Kudos Stars” and receive Thanksgiving gifts! Remember to book your calendar, let's have fun together on the day~
